info.description:
This set contains 28 different Halifax Box homes.
14 have two windows on the front and 14 have three windows on the front. Each Box is individually textured with a unique front and back. All 28 are part of the same prop family and can form 378 unique combinations. The Boxes provide R$$ housing and come in lot sizes 1x2, 2x2, 3x2 and 4x2. The 2x2s include corner versions and the 3x2s and 4x2s come with narrow driveways.
info.author: spa
